attachments.title: Trapit
attachments.text: Trapit is measurable, easy, fast and affordable content discovery, curation and delivery. Curating quality content creates thought leadership, captures marke...

text: <@U02613K0X> and <@U02618EV1>: we're getting rid of the hover quotes on the homepage logos. Which means we can also get rid of the "shorter quote" field in the CMS
<@U02618EV1> to lead users to the "what people are saying" page from that logo grid, i'm going to design a super simple button that will lead them there, instead of the tooltips.
client had a change of heart about the shortened quotes.
Sounds great. Also best timing ever as I was about to jump into making those tooltips!:relieved:
<@U0260V1BX> cool. iâ€™ll remove that stuff from the CMS today
<@U02618EV1> good! move on to the next thing :wink:
<@U02618EV1> SVG illustrations are here: clients/TrapIt/Trapit Website 2014/ Assets to Gaston/ILLUSTRATIONS/SVG ILLUSTRATIONS
i tried the sketch thing but it some ov the vectors were misaligned in sketch that werent in illustrator
do people have a bug tracking preference? so far i've heard a vote for trello. let me know how you guys would like to handle bug reporting & i'm happy to get us set up. thanks!
